content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 13}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}]
thought: I want to craft white_carpet. The first step is to craft white_wool, which requires string. Therefore I will move one string from slot 43 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
